name: Murkroot Shaman’s Cave
description: A damp cave hidden in the hillside, where goblins whisper about a shaman who bargains with strange spirits and makes villagers disappear.

encounters.title: Mouth of the Murkroot Cave
encounters.description: You stand at the mouth of a narrow cave. Cool, damp air spills out, carrying the smell of moss and smoke. Faint goblin voices echo from deeper within.

objectives.description: Find a safe way deeper into the cave.

enemies.name: Goblin Scout
enemies.description: A jittery goblin posted near the entrance, trying to look brave.
enemies.behavior: Skittish; may flee deeper into the cave if threatened.

enemies.name: Goblin Lookout
enemies.description: A goblin perched on a rock, squinting into the twilight.
enemies.behavior: Tries to warn the shaman if things go badly.

encounters.title: Sanctum of the Murkroot Shaman
encounters.description: You emerge into a wide cavern lit by sickly green candles. Chalk circles and bone charms cover the floor. At the far end, a goblin shaman raises a staff over a bound villager.

environment.terrain: uneven stone floor, crude stone altar

objectives.description: Stop the shaman’s ritual before something terrible happens.
Free the terrified villager from the altar.

enemies.name: Murkroot Shaman
enemies.description: A hunched goblin wrapped in stitched hides, clutching a bone staff crowned with a flickering green ember.
enemies.behavior: Cackling and theatrical; alternates between curses and desperate bargains.

enemies.name: Goblin Boneguard
enemies.description: A goblin in mismatched bits of bone armor, loyal to the shaman.
enemies.behavior: Protects the shaman at all costs.

enemies.name: Goblin Boneguard
enemies.description: Another bone-clad defender, slightly less sure about this whole ritual thing.

npcs.name: Terrified Villager
npcs.description: A villager tied to the stone altar, eyes wide with fear. Smells faintly of bread and onions.

items.name: Charred Bone Totem
items.description: A blackened bone charm, still warm to the touch and faintly humming with spirit energy.
items.effect: Once per Location: gain advantage on a single MAG-based check.

items.name: Half-Eaten Sandwich
items.description: Bread, meat, and something that might be pickle. Comforting, if you don’t think too hard about it.
items.effect: Once per Location: restore a small amount of HP or reduce fear in a tense social moment.

flow.condition: After defeating or bypassing the entrance scouts and heading deeper into the cave.
Once the shaman is defeated or driven off and the ritual is stopped.
